title: The Defection of A.J. Lewinter
description: In a republication of the author's 1973 first novel, unremarkable American scientist A. J. Lewinter triggers a series of high-stakes events when, during an academic conference in Tokyo, he contacts the KGB with an offer to defect, a proposal neither country can be sure is genuine. By the author of The Company. Reprint.
author: Robert Littell
